TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PathTooLongException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 路徑名稱或完整檔案名稱超過系統定義的最大長度時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a path or fully qualified file name is longer than the system-defined maximum length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的程式碼並沒有權限，錯誤訊息，此例外狀況可能包含唯一的檔案或目錄名稱而非完整路徑。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may contain only file or directory names instead of full paths. 在之前的.NET framework 版本底下執行的應用程式中[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，完整路徑不能超過 260 個字元，以維護與 Windows 作業系統的相容性。In apps that run under versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], full paths must not exceed 260 characters to maintain compatibility with Windows operating systems. 自動擲回任何路徑超過 260 個字元。Any path in excess of 260 characters automatically throws a . 如需這項限制的詳細資訊，請參閱文章[.NET 中的長路徑](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163666)BCL Team 部落格中。For more information about this restriction, see the entry [Long Paths in .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163666) in the BCL Team blog. > [!NOTE] > 這個例外狀況不會包含在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它的某些成員所擲回。This exception is not included in [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在此情況下攔截例外狀況，請撰寫`catch`處理陳述式改為。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement that handles an instead. 從下執行的應用程式開始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，.NET Framework 支援長的路徑超過 260 (或`MAX_PATH`) 字元。Starting with apps running under the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], the .NET Framework supports long paths in excess of 260 (or `MAX_PATH`) characters. 在哪些情況下的擲回例外狀況的.NET framework 版本而定，應用程式的目標：The conditions under which a exception are thrown depend on the version of the .NET Framework that an app targets: **目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]和更新版本****Apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] and later versions** 根據預設所支援長的路徑。Long paths are supported by default. 執行階段會擲回下列條件：The runtime throws a under the following conditions: - 作業系統傳回 `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG` 或其對應項。The operating system returns `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG` or its equivalent. - 路徑長度超過(32,767) 的字元。The length of the path exceeds (32,767) characters. **目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]及較早版本****Apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] and earlier versions** 依預設，會停用長的路徑，並維護舊版的行為。Long paths are disabled by default, and the legacy behavior is maintained. 執行階段會擲回每當路徑超過 260 個字元。The runtime throws a whenever a path exceeds 260 characters. 如果這不需要，應用程式的目標[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]和舊版，但執行所[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]可以藉由下列設定中的啟用長路徑支援[\<執行階段 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)應用程式的項目組態檔：If this is undesirable, apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] and earlier but run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] can enable long path support by including the following setting in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) element of the application configuration file: ```xml ``` 會使用 HRESULT `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG`，其具有 0x800700CE 的值。 uses the HRESULT `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG`, which has the value 0x800700CE.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_PATHTOOLONG，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its HRESULT set to COR_E_PATHTOOLONG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如現況 」 提供的路徑太長。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The supplied path is too long." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 「訊息」的內容必須能讓人了解。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用其訊息字串設定為 和其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_PATHTOOLONG，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to and its HRESULT set to COR_E_PATHTOOLONG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體使用`message`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 「訊息」的內容必須能讓人了解。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| 如需有關內部例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on inner exceptions, see .
